definition: mud and sand flow together (idiom)/good and bad mingle

sentences.english: Water bubbled up through the sand.
Halodule pinifolia (Miki) Hartog is the higher plant growing up in the Silt mixed area.
sentences.chinese: 線葉二藥藻是出現在泥沙區的高等植物。

sentences.english: The silt-carrying water gushes out of three specialised holes in the dam.
sentences.chinese: 這些夾雜着泥沙的水流從大壩的三個孔中被排出。

sentences.english: A dynamic criterion of suspended fine sand-mud is given in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先提出了一個細顆粒懸浮泥沙的動力學判據。

sentences.english: The coefficient is fitted from calculating the sediment diffusion coefficient by suspended load model.
sentences.chinese: 通過懸沙模型反求泥沙擴散係數的方法來擬合係數。

sentences.english: The shear velocity above the canopy is larger than that within the canopy.
sentences.chinese: 冠層內水流切變流速的減小有利於粘性泥沙的沉積。

sentences.english: The sediment movement is caused by the general actions of wave and tide.
sentences.chinese: 目前的泥沙運動是由波浪和潮流共同作用引起的。

sentences.english: To do is make up of social building stones and sand.
sentences.chinese: 要做的是做撐起社會大廈的石子和泥沙。

sentences.english: Sediment measurement is an important part of hydrometry.
sentences.chinese: 泥沙測驗是水文測驗的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Who play with sand, building towers, war, and then imitate Donald Duck to say.
sentences.chinese: 誰陪我玩泥沙建鐵塔喉嚨沙，在模仿唐老鴨說的話。

sentences.english: The commission has succeeded in reducing flooding and sedimentation.
sentences.chinese: 委員會已經成功減輕了洪水和泥沙淤積的狀況。

sentences.english: According to the measured data, the sediment deposition in the canal system of Weishan Irrigation District was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 根據實測資料，分析位山灌區渠系泥沙淤積問題。

sentences.english: Sand has silted up the river delta .
sentences.chinese: 泥沙把這條河的三角洲淤塞了。

sentences.english: Radioactive cesium has a tendency to bind with earth, and flow along with silt in water.
sentences.chinese: 放射性銫往往會與土壤結合在一起，隨泥沙順水而下。

sentences.english: This latest attempt essentially involves forcing mud down a pipe into the well.
sentences.chinese: 最近的努力包括通過管道向井中注入泥沙。

sentences.english: Non-toxic natural material; same as normal dirt and harmless to environment.
sentences.chinese: 無毒天然物，如一般泥沙對環境無害。

definition: to cleanse/to scrub/to scour/to wash down/to erode/to wash away
